pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Tidal Datasets // Contains functions for analysis and summary of tidal datasets. Also provides access to tidal data collected by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration's Center for Operational Oceanographic Products and Services and the Permanent Service for Mean Sea Level. For detailed description and application examples, see Hill, T.D. and S.C. Anisfeld (2021) doi:10.6084/m9.figshare.14161202.v1 and Hill, T.D. and S.C. Anisfeld (2015) doi:10.1016/j.ecss.2015.06.004.
